name: Leave me alone (itch) (GolDNenex)
description:
Are you going to survive & finally be alone? Repair your car to escape this hell.

My first finished game / gamejam ever !

The itch.io version was a qwerty version. 

For azerty user a version is hosted on my website :

https://goldnenex.ovh/projects/games/leavemealone/
